Text:
if you ( everybody ) look at a torrent and it has no screenshots or link to boxcover/official info about the file  google it and copy and paste links to the info to help everyone else out ! please dont be lazy and expect the uploaders to do everything..do it yourself , the more people stop being selfish & expecting someone else to do this the better off well all be, the piratebay may not be around forever so help out right now !

http://www.amazon.com/Chocolate-Sundaes-Presents-Sunset-Strip/dp/B0038P1D5A

Well, this DVD banks on Katt Williams... but it's 20 minutes of his old material, presented much better in "The Pimp Chronicles" release. Katt even mentions "It's 2004" and Sam Tripoli's cracking Kobe Bryant jokes to put a date on things. It would have been much better to try and get this released earlier, but now it's just a cash-in attempt. The best part of this DVD was Aries Spears, he was amazing if you'd never seen him outside of Mad TV.
